  • Method Details

    • change1stLvlOn2ndLvl

      public void change1stLvlOn2ndLvl(javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.image.ImageView playerImage, javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane pane, javafx.scene.image.ImageView obj1, javafx.scene.image.ImageView obj2, javafx.scene.image.ImageView obj3, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] hearts, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] shields, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] water, javafx.scene.control.Label[] labels, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] inventoryItems)
      Method that is responsible for changing 1-st level on 2-nd.
      Parameters:
      stage - main stage in Stage type.
      playerImage - player image.
      pane - main pane in AnchorPane type.
      obj1 - in ImageView type, one of the objects that disappears when opening the second level.
      obj2 - in ImageView type, one of the objects that disappears when opening the second level.
      obj3 - in ImageView type, one of the objects that disappears when opening the second level.
      hearts - array with all (ImageView)hearts.
      shields - array with all (ImageView)shields.
      water - array with all (ImageView)water.
      labels - array with all the labels in type Label that need to be transferred from the first level to the second.
      inventoryItems - array with all inventory items in type ImageView that need to be transferred from the first level to the second.

    • change2ndLvlOn1stLvl

      public void change2ndLvlOn1stLvl(javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.image.ImageView playerImage, javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane pane, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] hearts, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] shields, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] water, javafx.scene.control.Label[] labels, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] inventoryItems)
      Method that is responsible for changing 2-nd level on 1-st.
      Parameters:
      stage - main stage in Stage type.
      playerImage - player image.
      pane - main pane in AnchorPane type.
      hearts - array with all (ImageView)hearts.
      shields - array with all (ImageView)shields.
      water - array with all (ImageView)water.
      labels - array with all the labels in type Label that need to be transferred from the second level to the first.
      inventoryItems - array with all inventory items in type ImageView that need to be transferred from the second level to the first.
